Job Posting:171028 - Position: F25 Software Engineering Co-op 171028B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 07/03/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 06/26/2025 03:24 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country NeuroCatch Inc 13761 96 Avenue Unit 1009, City Centre 3 Surrey V3V 0E8 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Software Engineering Co-op 171028B Co-op Position Surrey, BC Canada 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Company Profile 0.0 per hour for 40 Major List $22 - $25.50 NeuroCatch Inc. (NCI), a HealthTech Connex Company is a pioneering health technology company committed to revolutionizing cognitive assessment through innovative neuroscience solutions. Specializing in objective, rapid, and accurate brain health evaluations, NeuroCatch leverages advanced EEG technology to provide clinicians with essential insights into cognitive function in six minutes. Our mission is to empower healthcare providers with precise diagnostic support, improve patient outcomes, and transform the standards of cognitive care. At NeuroCatch, we're shaping the future of brain health assessment by bridging neuroscience, technology, and patient care. Join a company with a vibrant culture driven by purpose-Boldly Elevating People. At NeuroCatch, we embody our core values of being GREAT: embracing a Growth Mindset, being Respectful, Elevating Others, remaining Authentic, and demonstrating True Grit. Work with us to make a meaningful impact and positively influence a billion brains. The Opportunity We are looking for a Software Co-op with an interest in programming, data science, medical product development, and new product design. If you are a self-motivated, team oriented individual striving for new and exciting opportunities, HTC is an amazing place for personal growth and development. If you are a self-motivated, team-oriented individual striving for new and exciting opportunities, NCI is an amazing place for personal growth and development. At the end of the role, you can look forward to valuable experience in a young, exciting medical company, working within a driven, fast-moving R&D team, self-managing and making decisions on a projects direction and gaining technical experience in the Python, C#, AWS and so much more. This collaborative role will work closely with all cross-functional teams including Client Support, Sales, Quality, Product Management, and Engineering. This is an exciting role for someone looking to build a robust system that will scale with demand. The ideal candidate is someone who aligns with our purpose (Boldly Elevate People) and shares our core values (Growth Mindset, Respectful, Elevates Others, Authentic and has True Grit). Responsibilities • Conduct product testing & test development • Assist in future product development and bug fixing • Perform general R&D engineering and problem solving • Troubleshoot performance, reliability, and stability issues • Collaborate in Agile software development activities Qualifications • Striving toward a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, STEM programs • Knowledge of software design principles, data structures and algorithms • Familiar with unit testing and user interfaces • Interested in C#, WPF, Python, SQL, NodeJS, Terraform • Interested in cloud architecture (AWS), DevOps, Git, Visual Studio • Curious in medical product development What We Offer • The opportunity to work in a dynamic, innovative and technology-driven environment with an engaging and supportive work culture. We strive to "Boldly Elevate People" and are dedicated to supporting internal growth as we take on new challenges in exciting, and forward-thinking industries. As we grow, you will too. • Our head office comes with additional benefits! Enjoy the rooftop terrace patio with stunning mountain views, access to 24/7 on-site gym facilities, weekly in-house fitness classes, healthy (and, sometimes, not-so-healthy) office snacks, and cupboards filled to the brim with coffee. Our Commitment to Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion HealthTech Connex is committed to creating a team of individuals where difference is celebrated and empowered. We vow that all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or age. HealthTech Connex is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status. Job Requirements Qualifications • Striving toward a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, STEM programs • Knowledge of software design principles, data structures and algorithms • Familiar with unit testing and user interfaces • Interested in C#, WPF, Python, SQL, NodeJS, Terraform • Interested in cloud architecture (AWS), DevOps, Git, Visual Studio • Curious in medical product development Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager
